Based on your request for sci-fi movies, I would like to recommend the movie "Inception".

" Inception " is a mind-bending science-fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan. The movie features an ensemble cast including Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy, and Ken Watanabe.

The plot of "Inception" revolves around a skilled thief who specializes in stealing secrets. When he's hired by a powerful businessman to steal his competitor's intellectual property, he discovers that the task at hand is more complex than he initially expected.

As the movie progresses, it takes the audience on an exhilarating and mind-bending journey filled with unexpected twists and turns, as well as plenty of action-packed sequences and thrilling moments that will keep audiences on the edge of their seats from beginning to end.

Overall, "Inception" is a highly entertaining and visually stunning sci-fi film directed by Christopher Nolan. Whether you're a seasoned sci-fi movie fan or just looking for an exciting and visually stunning science-fiction movie to watch this weekend, I would strongly recommend that you check out "Inception" today!
